task.title: Changing my background
task.shortdesc: To hide your physical environment, you can add a filter to blur your surroundings or use an image to obscure your background. The Change background feature is accessible from the preview window and the in-meeting menu, which means you can modify your background before or during a meeting. Contact your administrator if this feature is unavailable.

taskbody.prereq:
In order to use the blur or virtual background feature, the following conditions must be met:
Browser permissions must be granted.
For the menu to be enabled, you need to start your camera once. The menu becomes available after that, even when the camera is turned back off.
This feature must be enabled. For assistance, contact your server administrator.
